snippet: A debate is raging around a prize named after Dr. Thomas Parran Jr., who has been linked to unethical experiments, including the Tuskegee syphilis study.
abstract: Members of the American Sexually Transmitted Diseases Association are engaged in fierce debate over whether to rename award named after Dr Thomas Parran Jr, country's sixth surgeon general; Parran revolutionized medical policy concerning sexually transmitted diseases but is also linked with two of the most egregious medical scandals of the 20th century, including the infamous Tuskegee syphilis study.
lead_paragraph: A debate is raging around a prize named after Dr. Thomas Parran Jr., who has been linked to unethical experiments, including the Tuskegee syphilis study.

headline.seo: Link to Ethical Scandals Tarnishes Prestigious Parran Award
headline.main: Of Medical Giants, Accolades and Feet of Clay
headline.print_headline: Of Medical Giants, Accolades and Feet of Clay
